content.detailedDescription:
I have had dreams where they seem to be to real for at least 4 yrs or more, on tuesday aug 16th of 2011 i had one , i woke up about 5 30 am lying on my right side next to my wife , i rolled over on my back and straight above me was a square black hole ripped right threw my ceiling , the edge's were rolled over on to my ceiling , inside was just so dark but bright black , the darkest black i have ever seen ! , inside was a pair of bright orange eyes stair'ing down at me , they looked like they were about 2ft inside the black from where the ceiling should have been , i could not move as i was looking back at the eyes , at first i thought it was a devil or deamon come to take me , but just then it showed the outline of its shoulder an head area and i new it was something else , after about a minute the eyes seem to disappered up into the black an the tunnel thing shrank away and my ceiling returned back to normal , i wanted to be scared but something kept me calm , for 3 days i was so calm like it druged me or something , latter on that day my wife an my self went into the local supermarket in town an as soon as i walked in i felt like i was going to start floating up in air , i think they or what was using my dreams to test me ,for what i dont know , i have not had lifelike dreams sence that morning ! i know what i saw but i know what saw me , i would like to know if anyone else has had this happen to them ? 


signed why me ?


ps i would like to talk to someone about this but who ?
content.summary: Been having life like dreams ,woke up from one ,rolled over on my back , something  was watching me threw my sealing

content.detailedDescription: While staying at a hotel in north carolina, i went outside to take my dogs for a walk.  i was observing a strange, star-like object in the sky when i saw a very large disc-shaped ship come down, apparently, from that "star".  it had huge beaming yellow and white lights from all sides and it was descending very slowly in a straight path down until it was at my eye level.  after watching this i went inside the hotel room, let my dogs in, got my camera and went back outside.  i wanted a picture of it.  to my dissapointment, it was gone.  so i decided to take pictures of the strange star.  when i looked at the pictures on my computer i was amazed that i had indeed taken a picture, unknowingly of what i believe to be that disc-shaped ship.  although, it was completely invisible to the naked eye, the camera was able to pick up on it.  i went outside again and took more pictures and i was able to get 2 more photographs of it.  look in between the trees for a solid yellow, half-circle, 3 dimentional shape on the first picture.  please note that the digtal pictures attatched to this report are raw and have not been cropped or edited.
content.summary: While observing a strange star-like object, i saw a disc shaped, gigantic ship with white & yellow lights beaming off the sides.  the ship came straight down from way up high in the sky to my eye level.  i rushed inside to get my camera

content.detailedDescription: On approx. this date above my wife and i were sitting on the back deck of our house when from the southeast a boomerang shaped object came over head. we were both shocked. i would say it was as big as a 747 jet flying low enough to  look about 6 inches across if you were mesuring with a ruler. maybe that way you could get a heighth . there was no sound , flying very, very slow with what looked like heat around it. it was a clear night and the shape was as easy to see as the trees aorund the area. it flew over straight going north west. some ask how we saw it at night. now that is a dumb question. on a clear night you can see the outline of trees, houses, or what ever. the point is 2 weeks later we saw the same shape coming out of the south but much, much higher, glowing a golden color and traveling very fast. it again went straight over our house. but then again,2 weeks after that the same object came out of the southwest , higher again this time and traveling so fast i could just barely catch that it was the same object. i looked on line about the kaufman county ufo that someome took a daylight photo of and it is the same shape. but then again we saw an object that flew straight over the house from the north to south about a year ago that the wings were swept back just a little. it was harder to see but was a little higher than the fisrt object we saw but was slow, no lights, and no sound. my wife and i asked ourselves why we have seen these over the house and i guess it is because we sit out and star gaze.Just to let you know though. i do not belive in little green men. i do believe that the us has been able to do alot more than they will ever say. look at what germany was doing during wwii. i would love to know what they are though. i think the american people can handle antything. thanks for your time.
content.summary: A boomerang abject passed directly over my house, very large, 90 degree shaped wings, no sound, heat haves coming off wings

content.detailedDescription: This video goes with my original november 30th report.  it is a large, bright, multi-colored, star-like object, moving erradically, changing direction, yet staying within the same general vicinity. my son had already been observing this thing for over an hour before he came and got me.  after only a few seconds of gazing at it, i grabbed my video camera and shot 2 videos and several pictures.   my son and i went inside to view the pictures and were astounded that after 25 minutes of viewing pictures inside, that it was still out there.  so i took more pictures.  the object was visible for over 2 hours.  i never saw it leave and eventually, i just went to bed.  i still continued to look for it and it became visible again on december 10, 2011.  i have been documenting this object ever since.
content.summary: On november 30th, my son was alarmed at the sight of a very large, star-like object moving erradically at amazing speed

content.detailedDescription: I was laying in my bed watching tv, i felt the urge to look at my window with the blinds closed, but saw bright lights through them. i opened them to see what was so bright, then i saw 3 bright white lights forming a perfect triangle with a dull red pulsating light in the center of  the object.  i got very excited, and had the mind set to grab my camera which has a video recorder, opened my back door and started shooting the video. it made no noise and moved very slowly across the sky along the tree line. this was approximately at 11:45 pm on january 5, 2012. the triangle object started to turn on a yaw axis,and continued to rotate counter close wise which showed multiple lights. it was very dark in color, such as black. it vanished in a split second.
content.summary: Saw bright light out my window looked out and saw 3 white lights with reddish light pulsating grabbed camera  and got a video

content.detailedDescription: I was laying in my bed watching tv, i felt the urge to look at my window with the blinds closed, but saw bright lights through them. i opened them to see what was so bright, then i saw 3 bright white lights forming a perfect triangle with a dull red pulsating light in the center of  the object.  i got very excited, and had the mind set to grab my camera which has a video recorder, opened my back door and started shooting the video. it made no noise and moved very slowly across the sky along the tree line. this was approximately at 11:45 pm on january 5, 2012. the triangle object started to turn on a yaw axis,and continued to rotate counter close wise which showed multiple lights. it was very dark in color, such as black. it vanished in a split second.
content.summary: Saw bright light out my window looked out and saw 3 white lights with reddish light pulsating grabbed camera  and got a video

content.detailedDescription:
December 24th 2011
time was just before 10pm
location is ct rte49 in voluntown/sterling
duration was 2-3 minutes

	i was traveling north on rte 49 through voluntown/sterling ct just before 10 pm.. i was heading home from a family fuction. it was a clear night with many stars out. 
	route 49 runs north/south through voluntown and sterling and is a rural farming area that runs over the tops of many hills with thousands of open acreage of harvested corn fields. you can see for miles east and west in the stretch of 49 where this happened. 
	as i was driving i noticed what appeared to be an aircraft marker light that was blinking brilliant blue/white similar to a halogen light. it appeared to be flying low and fast. the light came out of the east just above the horizon and was moving west. it became brighter and changed to more like a flashing flood light when it got overhead. i looked west when it got overhead to see what it was. it did not continue west but instead followed me overhead and was now lighting up the road around me. 
	the flashing light was now so intense that it lit up the interior of my car as i had the roof window canopy opened with the glass was closed. i slowed down. it kept pace with my car, extremely bright and  flashing . 
	i  pulled off the road just long enough to open the roof window. i immediately noticed that there was no noise. the light was blinding when i looked up at it. it was hovering overhead.
	i closed the roof window and canopy. i locked my doors and drove off as fast as i could. i was in flight mode, in a cold sweat and focused on getting out of there. the flashing light kept pace overhead briefly. it then changed from a flood type light back to the initial blinking light that i had first noticed as it abruptly left me by turning quickly back to the east.
	this light came out of the east traveling west and perpendicular to route 49. when it got overhead it followed me north. when it left me it returned to the east. i have no  knowledge of aircraft that are able to make what appeared to me to be 90 degree turns or that can slow so fast and then hover silently. the light was silent and changed to more of a flashing flood light while overhead. i did not see any features of a craft during the whole incident which lasted only a couple of minutes.
	 i didn���t notice any other cars on this stretch of road at the time this happened.  i have found nothing similar to this on your website. i am wondering if i am the only person to have experienced this before?
content.distance: 21-100 Feet, 101-500 Feet, 501 Feet - 1 Mile, Over 1 Mile
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Intercepted, followed, hovered, then gone

content.detailedDescription:
I was filming an heavy spraying of chemtrails starting earlier 8ish yesterday, when all of the sudden i spotted a disk/oval shape craft flying alongs side one of the chemtrails as i try to zoom in, the auto focus of my camera made me lose track of the object. 

i include a short clip.
content.summary: Observed ufo while filming chemtrail spraying

content.detailedDescription: Almost every night looking into the west to south/westerly direction ive been observing what at first looks to be a bright star or planet. but after looking up witch star or planet it is, there are none in its currebt location. if you watch it long enough, you will see that it changes its postion every ffew minutes, and also sometimes has smaller less bright orbs come to and from it. some of these orbs i have filmed flying right over me. the night in question, i just so happened to be going to work this night and was driving in the direction of the craft. this is what truly got me to believe it was something in our atmousphere. i shot video of it from an easterly positon and then i drove around it and shot some video and photos from the west side of it. it seemed to be station over the goguac lake area, if i was to guess. this object is out almost every night, and will change its position all through the night. by 5 am the next morning it was still out, but was in a northerly position more over the downtown area. at this time there are no planes or any conventional craft out at this time.
content.summary: A bright sem i-staionary object that looks like a bright star but isnt. it changes its position every few minutes.

content.detailedDescription: While sitting in house this morning i glanced out window to north. i saw what was an aircraft at about a 60 angle in the sky more then several miles off at a high altitude. the anomaly did not seem to be moving and i asked my wife to look and tell me what she saw. her head was then in front of me for less then 10 sec. and she said she could not find it. i looked around her and it was gone i searched the area and could not see it anywhere. hence the term ufo....
content.summary: first thought was an aircraft in the north of my location sighting was for a few seconds

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting in the car outside my house and saw 2 lights to the south i got out of the car to get a better look after around 4 seconds one of the lights flew away very fast the other light stayed for another couple seconds then i turned to get back in the car once i was in the car i turned my camera back on and tried to snap another picture but as i took it the light dissapeared i dont know if this counts as a ufo sighting i need feed back
content.summary: I was sitting in the car outside my house and saw 2 lights to the south i got out of the car to get a better look after around 4 seconds one of the lights flew away very fast the other light stayed for another couple seconds

content.detailedDescription:
On the evening of dec. 30th, 2011, at aprox.���10:30pm, my wife and i witnessed a ufo from our bedroom balcony. it appeared initially out of the corner of my eye while i was a having a smoke on my balcony. it was very bright (yellow) and much bigger then any star visible by far. what caught my attention was that it seemed 2 b a very slow moving falling star/comet that was traveling slowly straight up. my view was due west and object couldn't have been more then 2-3miles away and 400/500 ft high (from when i 1st saw it). it was at this point i called my wife out and we both observed it. their was a police helicopter at a 2oclock position from it, further back in the sky. you could cleary see the difference. the object had no flashing lights, no collision lights etc. just very bright yellow. i thought for a moment that it may have been a helicopter search light merely pointed in my general direction. the object hovered for a duration of 2-3 seconds, leveled off and started flying directly towards us due east towards padadena. i'm in north glendale above glenoaks off of pacific. from my vantage point, i assumed it was somewhere over toll middle school initially.���
���������once it leveled off we got really excited. at this point my wife ran inside for the camera. i stood staring and could clearly see a bright yellow oval shaped light in front, with red and blue circles side by side, evenly spaced underneath it towards the back. it was a bright night, so i was able 2 make out a definite shape. by the time my wife ran back out to balcony the object was no more than 400 yards away. there was absolutely no noise. at this point we were 100% certain that it was not a helicopter, plane, blimp, balloon(s), or optical illusion of any kind. the quality of the 2 photos i was able 2 take were garbage. due to my patio light being right next 2 camera and my adrenaline high. all lights on object were rigid, and can cleary see outline. it was elongated, best way i can describe it as a chubby looking plane w/ no wings. it was flat on bottom, bright light in front, and as it past directly overhead and out of my line of site(couldn't see past roof of my building), i saw a much duller light in back. closer to the blue/red lights. at closest point it was as big as a stamp in sky, furthest point it was about a 1/3 of 1. we face towards burbank airport so planes/choppers etc are super common. u can hear helicopter rotor blades from miles, this thing glided overhead silently. wondering if anyone seen similar?Area? time? was pretty amazing. not cigar shaped, wider a bit flat on bottom.���
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
content.summary: Flat on bottom, like a space shuttle w/ no wings

content.detailedDescription:
On the night of jan.3rd 2012. i was watching the iss and tiangong space stations flyovers at 7 & 7:15pm. a few minutes later, i caught a small flash from the western sky. it was easy to see the first faint star-size light coming at me. but then i notice two more lights, one on each side of the first and further behind. 2 seconds has gone by, i now know that it's not planes off in the distance, flashed headlights from traffic, of fireworks. now it has shape, a triangle, but longer in front. another second goes by, and i am trying to see a form, but it's like looking thru water. the star light behind the object is being bent around it. only a slightly dark silhouette is moving thru the sky. 4 seconds have past now, and i have a clear view at maximum azimuth. now i need to figure out, how high is it? my first impression was low earth orbit. but this thing is moving fast, 2x the speed of the space stations i saw earlier. now i'm lowering my guess, because what i see is huge. possibly 2 miles long and 1 mile wide. the cloak made it hard to determine attitude, could have 100 miles up, or maybe just 20 miles up. after following it down range for another 4 or 5 seconds, it appeared to be up higher, around 100 miles. 

i saw a video that was taken in georgia during the summer of 2011. it was taken using night vision goggles in front of a camcorder. he captured the famed flying triangle flying in l.E.O.. in the video, you first see a jet 10 miles up, then by luck he catches the lights of the triangle at 100 miles up,and it is still bigger than the plane. that would be one huge piece of hardware, viewed from 10 times the distance.? i'd have to say that's probably what i saw too, the shape looked the same.

i have been watching satellites for 3 years. evenly with the coolest apps for smartphones, i still see unknown satellites. also saw a 90 degree turn in feb 2011. but this one was awwwwwwwessssssome!
content.summary: Saw cloaked large triangle in l.E.O.

content.detailedDescription: I stepped out for a smoke about 2140 hrs. noticed an extremly bright light about in path to the east of my postion next to orin belt star location. it had red, green , and white lights on top of it. took a slow path to the north, the stopped. remaided in place for over two hours. snapped five photos  at two diffent times. object is still hovering in same place at this time. current time is 2225 hrs. noticed stars and moved with axis of earth. but object has stayed in current loction without moving with the axis of the earth.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.shape: Disc,   Flash,   Sphere,   Star-like,   Other,   Unknown
content.summary: Bright ,hovering , pulsting lights, one plance for long amount of time

content.detailedDescription:
We were outside sitting on the porch at 8:45 p.M. smoking a cigarette. it's been my habit for the last few weeks to check for a particular star as it comes into view over the treetops around that time every night. i look for it every night because it's always the brightest star in view over my house.  i saw it in its usual spot, but then i noticed another, brighter star that was twinkling through the trees a little to the east of my star.  as i focused on it, i realized that it wasn't twinkling ... it was flashing. my husband was out with me and i called his attention to it.  i asked him if it was the space station (which i thought my star was) but as we watched it, it flashed brighter with multicolored lights.  red, blue, green, yellow, orange.  we got up and walked out into the yard, thinking to see it better through the trees.  

it hovered the whole time ... but would raise and lower a little bit, but randomly.  it wasn't a trick of the eye, though.  we noticed at the same time.  then i saw it split into two lights, twinkling different colors.  the second, new one raised up from the first only slightly and hovered a few seconds, before merging back into the first. that's when i went in to get the camera.  

i called my friend in carl junction to ask if she could see it from her house.  i told her which direction, she went outside and almost immediately spotted it.  she described to me exactly what i was seeing ... the flashing, multicolored lights, the slight rising and falling ... it was like nothing any of us have ever seen before.  she also started filming from her vantage point. 

i filmed ... i don't know ... 30 minutes or so over the course of an hour, and got several very clear still shots.  this object followed a track across the sky -- but slower than all the rest of the stars, i think.  i have no idea what this object is ... it could very well be the space station. but i would like a very thorough explanation and demonstration as to why this thing broke apart, merged, and flashed so many different colors for so long. it was like nothing i'd ever seen before.
content.summary: Incredibly bright flashing multicolored lights, split into 2 objects, then merged

content.detailedDescription: I was in the front yard and my neice pointed out a bright pulsating blue light west of where we were standing. it did not move and it was the brightest light in the sky. we watched it for awhile and i brushed it off as being a star and it was possibly pulsating from distant clouds moving. it was dark so i am not exactly sure if there was any clouds in the distance. i went back inside and my neice said it faded away and was gone. i don't think cloud coverage is a factor anymore, because i can still see stars out in that direction and the clouds obviously would have covered the other stars, as well.
content.summary: Pulsating bright blue light

content.detailedDescription: My friends and i (10) have just witnessed what we believe is the most historical ufo out break ever witnessed in southwestern indiana. the event lasted over 1 hr. there still out there as im typing this, tv, radio, law enforcement are all notified! ufo1 spotted at 6:50 you don't need pictures , there are already pics of these - very colorful, ufo 2 much to our surprise at first looked like a jet in a normal flight until it stopped on a dime looks exactly like #1 about 1 mile apart, stationary!My friend and i continued to or destination, the 2 ojects were northwest of evansville and were making there presents known. just to keep it in line it 's now 7:00 pm. we continued in and ask our friends to check it out, we all agree on what we saw. military planes? keep streaking across the sky leaving vapor trails, at the same elevation but keeping distance. after my experience the other day, i ask my friend if he wanted to stay i was going home to be with my family, he also was good to go. we were heading south twards the ohio river and bam there was #3 across the river look like it was over henderson just like the other 2, and maybe 5 miles northeast #4 just like 1,2,3. just before dropping my buddy at his home, we took a few minutes to regroup in a parking lot that is located in an ideal location to look out over the city of evansville. one after another objects were crossing the sky, 4 orbs emmitting multi-colors hovering (7:45pm), i dropped my friend and headed home. i spoke with a mufon member a couple days ago, i was to talk with him, last couple days been trying to get a grip after my encounter a couple days ago, having may good friends around to witness what we did tonight, unbelieveable i never dreamed in all my days. i'm going back out side, with camera and video, let's see what i get.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Ufo #1 northwestern sky very colorfull  hovering, ufo #2 moved in from the east across evansville looked like a plane then all of a sudden it stopped, those 2 tracked north slowly over 1 hr! ufo 3 over henderson ky. ufo 4 over east sie. jets everywhere!

content.detailedDescription: Went outside that perceived smoke, and wanted to see where he came to claim it was pretty, and improve the look i noticed the object, i ran on my cell phone to record it and got more than 50 seconds of the moving object
content.summary: Like square

content.detailedDescription: I really just want you to look at it now or have someone look at it  disc multi colored, rotating from side to side,  could see colors through binnoculars and also could see shape clearly  looked like lights were around middle of disc and it looked very large relative to distance
content.summary: Still there now.  disc shaped rotating red, green blue  4 witnesses

content.detailedDescription: I filmed this with a celestron telescope and a camcorder.  you be the judge.  are they hiding something or not?
content.summary: Huge tower located on the moon!!

content.detailedDescription: I was on my way home from work, around 8:10pm est driving on rt 85 eastbound towards my home when i saw a 3 light tipped triangle cross the road over the tree tops. i was on the phone with my mother at the time, and stated that i saw some weird lights. it was enormous, easily larger than a commercial large passenger air craft if it was within 100 feet of the tree tops. there were no visible lights other than the 3 bright white exterior lights on each of the 3 tips of the triangle. you could not see through the object, and the sky was clear. as soon as the first trangle was out of sight, not more than 2 seconds behind it, i saw a second identical triangle pass along the same path. if i was eastbound on 85 both passed me going left to right. at the time i saw the second light i was literally so blown away i was yelling into the phone. i got off the phone and by the time i got to my home, with wide open sky i could see nothing. as stated before, the triangles both were enourmous and identical, no blinking lights, no sound. as i saw the second triangle i rolled down my window. if it were commercial aircraft, it would have been so close and so low there would have to have been audible noise. it was completely silent outside save the noise of my vehicle on the road.
content.summary: 2 triangle craft - moving over rt 85

content.detailedDescription: I was standing in my back yard right outside my door on my patio. i was getting ready to grill dinner. the grill was alredy lit. i had been looking at the stars because it was a perfectly clear sky. i was looking at one of the brightest objects in the sky besides the moon that night and then noticed an object moving threw some pine tree limbs that was very bright, this thing was brighter that the brightest stars out tonight, i continued to watch the object move because i am familiar with aircraft and the way their flight characteristics and the light was not blinking, i new it was sonething i'd never seen before ,then the object started changing it's flight pattern by making a turn and it also moved from side to side slightly. the object was a perfect round ball of pure white light. i could not hear any sounds of aircraft. since it was moving so slow i ran in the house to get my mother and she also saw the object. i ran inside to get her, it only took a few seconds to get back to viewing the object. by the time she got outside it was no longer directly above me it was moving away from the house and we both said it looked to be getting lower and then dissapered behind the tree line. that's the last we saw of this object. there was heavy airplane traffic afterwards in the area that i noticed because i stayed outside for awhile afterwards to grill pork chops.I could hear the planes as they went by and they where even higher that the object. i think the object may have been visible before i noticed it because i was so close to my house that it bloked some of my field of view behind me. this is why i only saw it appear directly above me and then flew out of sight. my eyes where frozen to the sky when i saw it, i almost tripped over the top to the grill sitting on the patio. i walked out into my yard as it whent away kind of following it to get a better view. i was able to see the object perferctly clear with nothing in the way after i walked out into my yard because there are no trees where it ended up flying. we lost sight when it seemed to get lower and ferther away and dissapeared behind the tree line.
content.summary: I saw an extremely bright white object appear directly overhead with no sound. it moved very slow, changed flight pattern multiple times, had no sound, it dissapeared behind the tree line.

content.detailedDescription:
It was about 12:10 am on new years day, when i went to take my dogs outside.  at that moment i was looking up at the stars when i noticed there were 3 orange/red glowing orbs moving from ssw to nne.  at first i dismissed it as maybe some chinese laterns or flares but from the distance i was at observing these objects, there were no signs of flames or pulsating lights within.  the more i looked at it the more i was comimng to the realization i was seeing something very unusual.  my 6 children were home at the time and i immediately called them to come look at what i was seeing.  their ages range from 15 to 8.  we were all in amazement.  these orbs looked as if they could be of great proportion but being i believe pretty far away from them i couldnt get a real idea of how big they were or if they were possible part of an even bigger object.  

i am a skeptic so this has really been messing with my head.  i have been trying to wrap my head around what i possibly saw that night.  thank goodness for the internet because i have been searching to see if anyone else had witnessed what we saw that night.  when searching i found many reports that matched the description of what i saw and fortunately there were pictures and videos attached to verify it also.  when i pulled up the first video i immediately freaked out because it was exactly what i saw and these images were captured in different parts of the country on the same day.  i still have no explaination for what my family and i saw.  it has really changed my belief on things.  i now dont read reports and automatically assume that the person is crazy and is just saying these things for the attention. 

i do know i wasn't seeing things thankfully because my 6 children witnessed it too and also thanks to mufon i was able to find another report from someone who witnessed the samething her in louisville, ky.  the fact that i found this report made me  decide to report what i saw in hopes to see if anyone else saw the same thing.
content.summary: 3 red-orange orbs moving in straight-line right after midnight new years

content.detailedDescription:
My son and i were driving up the street from where we were living and saw out the car window hundreds of ufo's flying in a tight grid formation. we stopped and i ask my son if he saw what i saw and he did. they were way up and probably over a mile up because they looked small. they were oval shape and white in color. they were not birds or geese. they were up to high and they did not have a typical v geese pattern. they were in a grid pattern side by side but hundreds that filled the sky. i called the state police but they had no reports.
i have always wanted to tel our story.
content.summary: Hundreds of ufo's flying in a tight grid pattern flying in one direction

content.detailedDescription:
While standing in front yard showing my grandaughter the rising near full moon to the eastsaw an object travel from northwest to southeast a halph a little finger width below moon traveling at a high rate of speed with no contrail. object was bright white and was able to capture image on my flip video and was witnessed by my wife.We watched object travel into mexico over i would guess el condor area.
 it reminded me of when space shuttle would pass over during orbit.
sun out no clouds in sky temp appy 78 deg.Time 5 09 p.M. pacific
content.summary: While looking at near full moon in cloudless sky saw a bright white object pass from northeast to southwest below angle of moon in relation to myself was able to capture on flip video although hard to see it was traveling at high rate of speed

content.detailedDescription: It was 5:30am and i was out in my back yard in the coastal community of solana beach, ca. i've never star gazed at that hour before, but i was looking for some meteors before getting ready for work. it was a real clear sky and i was excited to see several meteors but then all of a sudden from the west came this shape of blurry white/yellow lights in the shape of a boomerang with space between each light. at first i thought it must be a flock of birds because of its shape ( that is the only thing i could think of making that type of shape in the sky) but i couldn't understand how it would be glowing. and why would there be darkness between the lights as if every other bird was lite up. but as it went over my head i realized these weren't birds. my brain was trying to process what i was seeing and come up with a rational explanation, but i have none. there were 5 lights but they were blurry glowing like behind a mist and  i watched it go right over my head and to the east in a straight path until it disappeared. i have no idea how high it was, except to say that it wasn't like looking at a jet way up high.  it was much closer than that. and much larger.  it took about 6 seconds for it to pass. i was in complete shock as to what i had just seen. i had wished more than anything that my husband had been outside with me, but he was sound asleep.  i am not one to have ever visited this or any other ufo site, but i have talked to several people about what i saw and one of them told me about this web site. i checked the local news when i got home, but no one reported anything, but then again neither did i. so if someone out there can give me an explanation as to what it could of been i would love it.
content.summary: Saw lights in the shape of a flock of birds or boomerang coming from the west heading east that glowed in a misty sort of way.

content.detailedDescription:
It was a crystal clear night, i went out sid with my binoculars as i usaually do on a clear night to look at the moon. as i glanced up i noticed what i thought was a star at 10 pm to the moon the next day i went out the same star was now at 5 pm position. the 3rd day i went out it was at 7pm position with a clear ring around the moon. i went out to night all though there is some cloud cover the bright star is gone. i am very excited about this  because it is my first sighting. this star slowly rotated around the moon for at least 3 days and then vanished i would like to know if any body else noticed this. i truley believe this is an alien aircraft observig earth. stars do not rotate around the moon.
thank you!!!!!!!
content.summary: This hovered around moon

content.detailedDescription:
My daughter (18), son (15), and i left our house to go to the store which is about 35 to 45 minutes away. 5 miles with turns south, east, then south again, we go east one more mile before turning south onto the long stretch of dirt road that leads us to hy-way 10. the road before we make that last south turn has some trees and a house with other out buildings on the corner where we turn south. when we made the turn going south i noticed what i thought was a low, slanted, thick, white jet stream. as i'm driving i realized that what i thought was a jet stream was not getting longer or dissipating. then i saw that there was not a plane or jet at either end. i said to my kids, "look at that white line in the sky. i thought it was a jet stream but i can't find a jet." but of course, no one was paying any attention to me. she was listening to her i-pod in the front seat and he was playing his pcp in the back seat.  i tapped on her arm to get her attention and then this was the conversation and what happened during it. i said, "look at that weird jet stream", she said, "where?, and i said, "there!", she says, "where?" i yelled, "there (pointing), right there, are ya blind?" then at that time it kinda dropped or fell like a leaf tilting back and forth causing it to reflect a brilliant silver just like the mercury inside a thermometer. i said,"what the h***? look at what it's doing, look, what is it? look at that s***! no way! do ya see it?" she said, "no, where is it?" at some point, i don't know when, i had attracted my sons attention to. then, i did not see it either. i said, "it's gone! where is it? where did it go?" i looked to the south and saw a black round shape about the size of a quarter at an arms length. i said, "there it is! right there. see that black thing? my silly daughter still can't find it. she said, "where?", my son reached his arm over the front seat and pointed. he said, "there, there it is. now do you see it"? i said, "to late. it's gone. no it isn't, look!". now it had zipped south then west and was about the size of a dime this time. then i said, "it moved again, it's gone again, it's gone, you missed it. you have got to be blind as a bat!" my son pointed again and said, "no, look a little bit right. it's really little now." he was right, there it was. it had zipped south, and a bit west again. now it was about the size of a pea. i don't remember if my daughter wound up finding it or not. i really don't understand why she could not find it at first. i think i'm gonna make my son sit in the front from now on. lol! just joking. any way, we lost sight of it for good after that. for the first couple of days after that i thought about it off and on. then thought about it more and more trying to make sense of the white line that i first thought was a jet stream, or trail. now i can see a big difference between the white line and a jet stream. jet streams will sometimes, swell, take on different shapes, grow longer in front, fade or dissipate at their end. the white line did none of these. it was wider than a jet stream. it did not get longer or shorter. it was a pure white color, a solid white that had straight edges, not the rolling puffy looking edges. now i think about it all the time. it all happened so fast after the white line showed itself to be something other than a jet stream. it was an extremely shocking and unexpected experience!!! 

if you try to contact me please dial the number 2 times in a row so i will know to pick up. i don't answer my phone if i don't recognize the phone number due to past stalking incident. you can also text me and let me know your going to call or you can email me to set up a time when you would like to call. 

thanks for your time.
content.summary: Slanted solid thick white line that dropped/fell into silver something that darted farther 3x looking like round black shape to a dot.
